D

DiversificationFormat - Class in es.uned.nlp.rbu
This source implements the metric RBU presented in the paper:

     An Axiomatic Analysis of Diversity Evaluation Metrics: Introducing the Rank-Biased Utility Metric.

Evaluate - Class in es.uned.nlp.rbu

evaluate() - Method in class es.uned.nlp.rbu.RBU
Method that evaluates a system output with a gold standard, both in a DiversificationFormat object, using the RBU metric

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class es.uned.nlp.rbu.Evaluate
The package must be invoked with 4 parameter: ValueParameterP ValueParameterE pathGoldStandard pathSystemOutput
     Example: java -jar rbu-0.1.jar 0.8 0.03 test/gold.tsv test/output.tsv
